text:
Willi "Ille" Gerdau (February 12, 1929 in Heide – February 11, 2011 in Uetersen) was a German footballer.
Gerdau was a midfielder, who played for Heider SV.
He participated in the 1956 Summer Olympics in Australia, and also in the national football team of West Germany in 1957.
Willi Gerdau died the day before his 82th birthday.

annotations.surface_form: national football team of West Germany
